channel.title: IP and port on client
channel.description:
Hi guys, [b] I just recently bought a new VPS and am having trouble editing the IP and port in the client and server files.[/b] [i] If you are good with this, and know what your doing, please contact me on msn asap! Or post below
My msn: bode@live.com
I will even go as far as paying you for help, if that's what it takes.... Contact me ASAP![/i]
Many Thanks!

Ok buddy,i can code the server,give me the client with all details you can provide,and yes,i’ll even add extra models like d plate body,d claws,new g swords and vesta,statius,and clan wars too
